website_summaries.verdict: A well-priced backpack from Black Diamond with a focus on everyday use.
pros: The nylon exterior is easy to wipe off or clean when necessary
Single pocket on the outside is convenient for small devices
cons: The wider straps are prone to sliding off narrower shoulders during extended use

customer_reviews.title: Great multi-pitch pack
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pack to use on multi-pitch climbs and also short day hikes. It's the perfect size (for reference, I was able to fit my approach shoes, a water bottle, a guide book, some snacks, and a rope bag into it for a shorter multi the other day). I also have used it as my personal item while flying. Unfortunately it is just barely too small to fit my 17" laptop (but mine is a bit larger than most to compensate for a nicer keyboard). But that's a very minor issue for me. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob S.

customer_reviews.title: Small but Mighty
customer_reviews.text: A hearty pack! I use it for bouldering.rock climbing both indoors and outdoors. It easily fits a pair of shoes, harness, chalk bag (standard size), carabiner, deodorant, keys, wallet, phone, travel battery pack, and climbing tape. With room! Honestly, I needed a minimalist pack that could still get the job done. This pack did just what I needed - I was skeptical at first, to be honest, but when I got the pack...it's a little bigger than you expect and from what's pictured. Definitely worth the sub-$60 price.
customer_reviews.author: S. Le

customer_reviews.title: Ideal size for 1/2 day trip or climbing gym shoes & equipment
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag to carry a set of clothes, equipment & shoes for the climbing gym. I also use it for other trips to the gym. The bag is smaller than one you’d use for a day trip, but big enough to fit the items listed above along w/ some toiletries.
customer_reviews.author: JamCo

customer_reviews.title: So durable and light.
customer_reviews.text: I love them. The brand makes the best backpacks that are so durable. I use it as my hiking and biking backpack. I make it the tightest fit and it carries my bottle of water and a pair of shoes when I go hiking.
customer_reviews.author: Vivienne

customer_reviews.title: and a chalk bag in the main compartment with a nice place to put extra chalk in the
customer_reviews.text: Wish it was just slightly bigger but i can fit my harness, shoes, flip flops, and a chalk bag in the main compartment with a nice place to put extra chalk in the front
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Good for just about everything!
customer_reviews.text: This backpack was almost ideal for what I got it for. This worked as a day hiking back, crag bag, and grocery bag. It held all my snack, water and headlamp for my strenuous hikes, it held my chalk bag, shoes and harness (if I needed anything else in there I would need to attach it to the outside) and it fit a decent amount of groceries in it. My only complaint was that I wish it had water bottle holders on the outside, and it had more padding on the back. other than that it was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Abby M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for flying
customer_reviews.text: I got this bag for a flight and it turned out to be really good. Was able to fit many essentials for my 9h flight. Looks awesome too!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Ceban

customer_reviews.title: Great for however you prefer to go to work without your car.
customer_reviews.text: Really good deal. Very practical. I will be buying other products from this brand. One requested improvement for this product though is compression straps, to make the bag quieter and the contents more streamlined and in place when running.
customer_reviews.author: P. Neugebauer

customer_reviews.title: Great Pack
customer_reviews.text: I use it to work everyday. You can really load it up and it sits well on your back and shoulders. Black Diamond makes great gear.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Monasmith

customer_reviews.title: Attack pack!
customer_reviews.text: Great attack pack! Sturdy, simple, well designed. Love it! I’ve used it on all day multi pitch climbs, day hikes/ trail runs and just around town. Perfect for all of the above. Had it for a year, it’s endured all kinds of abuse and looks brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Colin Brochard

customer_reviews.title: Good function bullet pack
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a crag and gym climbing bag for for 7- year old and I want it. It’s functional and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Tessie Rose

customer_reviews.title: super simple design, excellent quality, compact.
customer_reviews.text: uh, the headline says it all: super simple design, excellent quality, compact.
customer_reviews.author: andrew turman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product and great experience w/ Clever Training!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome pack!!! Product as described and Clever Training did a great job with prompt packing/shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pack
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love it. It is the perfect size for me and carried all my needs for xc skiing.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela M. Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend! Very versitle bag..
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this bag. I use it climbing, backpacking, and skiing. It is very versitle, lightweight and durable.
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: Best day pack.
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight. I was able to pack two days worth of clothes and some books. Bulky but it gets the job done. Love the chest strap as well.
customer_reviews.author: BL

customer_reviews.title: Great little daypack
customer_reviews.text: Great little daypack, feels as rugged as claimed (though I haven't dragged it through any canyons or caves yet), has a few organizational features while remaining very simple, and supports a hydration bladder. It's compact enough to take on a run without feeling it lumbering on your back, but you can still cram a decent amount of stuff in there.
customer_reviews.author: Cornelius Peffenfeffer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Small but perfect for everyday use and trips to gym!
customer_reviews.author: malin johnson

customer_reviews.title: Kids size backpack
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely tiny, it's useless. Looks twice as large in photos.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great pack.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect no-nonsense day pack / travel carry-on for me. It fits my 11" Macbook Air (in a neoprene sleeve) like it was made for it, as well as associated cables and a few other odds & ends (glasses case, kindle, etc). Build quality seems superior. One of my favorite features is that it doesn't have a million straps, bungies, buckles, and molle loops hanging off it.
customer_reviews.author: GG

product_meta.title: Black Diamond Bullet 16 Backpack
product_meta.description: Take a sleek style to the trails with the Black Diamond® Bullet 16 Daypack. Bullet panel loader is an excellent rig for off-trail or high-mileage scrambles. Zippered panel opening. Outer stash pocket. Hydration compatible. Contoured shoulder straps for carrying comfort. Torso: up to 16". 20 mm webbing hipbelt for added support. Materials: Tough 420d nylon and 1260d ballistic nylon. Volume: 16 L. Imported. Measurements: Bottom Width: 10 in Depth: 3 1⁄2 in Height: 17 in Strap Length: 34 in Strap Drop: 14 1⁄2 in Handle Length: 7 in Handle Drop: 2 1⁄2 in Weight: 1 lb 2.6 oz
